title remedy: Complete and submit REG 227. This is the application for duplicate title required by California.
Submit a copy of government-issued ID and proof of ownership (bill of sale or lien release).
Submit an MVT‑5‑13 form to verify VIN and initiate Alabama title process.
Obtain seller’s signature on the assignment of title and resubmit MVT‑41‑1.
Resubmit MVT‑12‑1 form with payment; ensure vehicle is properly registered.
Provide notarized affidavit with correct name and copy of photo ID.
Schedule VIN inspection with local DMV and submit MVT‑5‑13 with correct VIN.
Upload lien release document and valid proof of residence to complete application.
Contact lienholder for release letter and submit to Alabama Title Division.
Pay outstanding $18 title fee via check or money order to AL Department of Revenue.
